# Load data

```{r message=FALSE}
profiles <- read_csv("data/cell_health_merged_feature_select.csv.gz")

metadata <- get_annotation(profiles)
```


```{r}
if (file.exists("data/sim.parquet")) {
  message("Loading existing similarity file...")
  sim_df <- arrow::read_parquet("data/sim.parquet")
    
} else {
  sim_df <- sim_calculate(profiles)
  sim_df %>% arrow::write_parquet("data/sim.parquet")
}
```

# Compute similarity sets

```{r}

# ---- 0. Filter out some rows ----

drop_group <-
  data.frame(Metadata_gene_name = "EMPTY")

# ---- 1. Similarity to reference ----

# Fetch similarities between
# a. all rows (except, optionally those containing `reference`)
# and
# b. all rows containing `reference`
# Do so only for those (a, b) pairs that
# - have *same* values in *all* columns of `all_same_cols_ref`
    
reference <-
  data.frame(Metadata_gene_name = c("Chr2", "Luc", "LacZ"))

all_same_cols_rep_ref <-
  c(
    "Metadata_cell_line",
    "Metadata_gene_name",
    "Metadata_pert_name",
    "Metadata_Plate"
  )

# ---- 2. Similarity to replicates (no references) ----

# Fetch similarities between
# a. all rows except `reference` rows
# and
# b. all rows except `reference` rows (i.e. to each other)
#
# Do so for only those (a, b) pairs that
# - have *same* values in *all* columns of `all_same_cols_rep
#
# Keep, both, (a, b) and (b, a)

all_same_cols_rep <-
  c("Metadata_cell_line",
    "Metadata_gene_name",
    "Metadata_pert_name")


# ---- 3. Similarity to replicates (only references) ----

# Fetch similarities between
# a. all rows containing `reference`
# to
# b. all rows containing `reference` (i.e. to each other)
#
# Do so for only those (a, b) pairs that
# - have *same* values in *all* columns of `all_same_cols_rep_ref`.
#
# Keep, both, (a, b) and (b, a)

all_same_cols_ref <-
  c("Metadata_cell_line",
    "Metadata_Plate")

# ---- 4. Similarity to non-replicates ----

# Fetch similarities between
# a. all rows (except, optionally, `reference` rows)
# to
# b. all rows except `reference` rows
#
# Do so for only those (a, b) pairs that
# - have *same* values in *all* columns of `all_same_cols_non_rep`
# - have *different* values in *all* columns `all_different_cols_non_rep`
# - have *different* values in *at least one* column of `any_different_cols_non_rep`
#
# Keep, both, (a, b) and (b, a)

any_different_cols_non_rep <-
  c("Metadata_cell_line",
    "Metadata_gene_name",
    "Metadata_pert_name")

all_same_cols_non_rep <-
  c("Metadata_cell_line", 
    "Metadata_Plate")

all_different_cols_non_rep <-
  c("Metadata_gene_name")

# ---- 5. Combine 1-4 and annotate the similarity matrix ----

annotation_cols <-
  c("Metadata_cell_line",
    "Metadata_gene_name",
    "Metadata_pert_name")

grouped_sim <-
  sim_munge(
    sim_df,
    metadata,
    reference,
    all_same_cols_rep = all_same_cols_rep,
    all_same_cols_rep_ref = all_same_cols_rep_ref,
    all_same_cols_ref = all_same_cols_ref,
    any_different_cols_non_rep = any_different_cols_non_rep,
    all_same_cols_non_rep = all_same_cols_non_rep,
    all_different_cols_non_rep = all_different_cols_non_rep,
    annotation_cols = annotation_cols,
    drop_group = drop_group
  )

```

# Check

Check for duplicates 

```{r}
stopifnot(
  grouped_sim %>%
    anti_join(reference, by = colnames(reference)) %>%
    unite("id12", all_of(c("id1", "id2")), sep = ":") %>%
    pull("id12") %>%
    duplicated() %>%
    any() %>%
    not()
)

stopifnot(
  grouped_sim %>%
    inner_join(reference, by = colnames(reference)) %>%
    filter(type == "rep") %>%
    unite("id12", all_of(c("id1", "id2")), sep = ":") %>%
    pull("id12") %>%
    duplicated() %>%
    any() %>%
    not()
)

stopifnot(
  grouped_sim %>%
    inner_join(reference, by = colnames(reference)) %>%
    filter(type != "rep") %>%
    unite("id12", all_of(c("id1", "id2")), sep = ":") %>%
    pull("id12") %>%
    duplicated() %>%
    any() %>%
    not()
)
```

Report counts

```{r}
all_sim_counts <-
  grouped_sim %>%
  group_by(across(all_of(c("id1", all_same_cols_rep, "type")))) %>%
  tally() %>%
  arrange(across(all_of(all_same_cols_rep))) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = "type",
              names_prefix = "n_",
              values_from = n,
              values_fill = 0)
```


Replicate counts (`n_pert` perturbations have `n_rep` replicate similarities)

```{r}
all_sim_counts %>%
  group_by(n_rep) %>%
  tally(name = "n_pert") %>%
  select(n_pert, n_rep)
```

Non-replicate counts (`n_pert` perturbations have `n_nonrep` non-replicate similarities)

```{r}
all_sim_counts %>%
  group_by(n_nonrep) %>%
  tally(name = "n_pert") %>%
  select(n_pert, n_nonrep)
```


Reference counts (`n_pert` perturbations have `n_ref` reference similarities)

```{r}
all_sim_counts %>%
  group_by(n_ref) %>%
  tally(name = "n_pert") %>%
  select(n_pert, n_ref)
```

# Inspect 

```{r}
norm_nonrep_metrics <- 
  sim_metrics(grouped_sim, "nonrep")

norm_ref_metrics <- 
  sim_metrics(grouped_sim, "ref")

per_row_metrics <-
  inner_join(
    norm_nonrep_metrics[["per_row"]],
    norm_ref_metrics[["per_row"]],
    by = c("id1", all_same_cols_rep, "sim_mean_agg")
  )

per_group_metrics <-
  inner_join(
    norm_nonrep_metrics[["per_group"]],
    norm_ref_metrics[["per_group"]],
    by = c(all_same_cols_rep, "sim_mean_agg_mean_agg", "sim_mean_agg_median_agg")
  )
```

  
```{r}
plot_scatter <- function(df, x0, y0) {
  df %>%
    ggpubr::ggscatter(x = x0,
                      y = y0) +
    ggpubr::stat_cor(method = "spearman") + coord_equal()
}
```


```{r}
plot_scatter(
  per_row_metrics, 
  "sim_scaled_mean_agg_nonrep", 
  "sim_mean_agg") + 
  ggtitle("Replicate level, wrt nonreps")

plot_scatter(
  per_group_metrics, 
  "sim_scaled_mean_agg_nonrep_mean_agg", 
  "sim_mean_agg_mean_agg") + 
  ggtitle("Perturbation level, wrt nonreps (mean)")

plot_scatter(
  per_group_metrics, 
  "sim_scaled_mean_agg_nonrep_median_agg", 
  "sim_mean_agg_median_agg") + 
  ggtitle("Perturbation level, wrt nonreps (median)")
```


```{r}
plot_scatter(
  per_row_metrics, 
  "sim_scaled_mean_agg_ref", 
  "sim_mean_agg") + 
  ggtitle("Replicate level, wrt reference")

plot_scatter(
  per_group_metrics, 
  "sim_scaled_mean_agg_ref_mean_agg", 
  "sim_mean_agg_mean_agg") + 
  ggtitle("Perturbation level, wrt reference (mean)")

plot_scatter(
  per_group_metrics,
  "sim_scaled_mean_agg_ref_median_agg",
  "sim_mean_agg_median_agg") + 
  ggtitle("Perturbation level, wrt reference (median)")
```


```{r}
plot_scatter(
  per_row_metrics, 
  "sim_scaled_mean_agg_ref", 
  "sim_scaled_mean_agg_nonrep") + 
  ggtitle("Replicate level, wrt reference, wrt nonreps")

plot_scatter(
  per_group_metrics, 
  "sim_scaled_mean_agg_ref_mean_agg", 
  "sim_scaled_mean_agg_nonrep_mean_agg") + 
  ggtitle("Perturbation level, wrt reference, wrt nonreps (mean)")

plot_scatter(
  per_group_metrics, 
  "sim_scaled_mean_agg_ref_median_agg", 
  "sim_scaled_mean_agg_nonrep_median_agg") + 
  ggtitle("Perturbation level, wrt reference, wrt nonreps (median)")

```

```{r message=FALSE}
gritpy <- 
  read_tsv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/broadinstitute/grit-benchmark/31d9812e0c267d3535c85a72ef6bd0104d1a2130/1.calculate-metrics/cell-health/results/cell_health_grit.tsv") %>%
  filter(barcode_control == "cutting_control" & cor_method == "pearson" & grit_replicate_summary_method == "mean") %>%
  arrange(cell_line, perturbation, group) %>%
  anti_join(
    drop_group %>%
      rename(group = Metadata_gene_name)
  ) %>%
  select(
    cell_line, perturbation, group, grit
  )
```


```{r}
gritr <-
  per_group_metrics %>%
  select(
    perturbation = Metadata_pert_name,
    group = Metadata_gene_name,
    grit = sim_scaled_mean_agg_ref_median_agg,
    cell_line = Metadata_cell_line
  ) %>%
  arrange(cell_line, perturbation, group)

```

```{r}
grit_compare <-
  inner_join(
    gritpy,
    gritr,
    by = c("cell_line", "perturbation", "group"),
    suffix = c("_py", "_r")
  )
```

```{r}
plot_scatter(grit_compare %>% na.omit(), "grit_py", "grit_r")
```
